RAW.SOURCE:
` *---------------------------------------------------------------------* * Include ZAPLINK_FRM *---------------------------------------------------------------------* DEFINE mac_replace. replace all occurrences of regex '<:&2:>' in &1 with sy-&2. END-OF-DEFINITION. */---------------------writeMessage-----------------------\ FORM writemessage USING value(p_type) TYPE sy-msgty value(p_msg). CASE p_type. WHEN 'E' OR 'A' OR 'X'. WRITE / icon_red_light AS ICON. WHEN 'W'. WRITE / icon_yellow_light AS ICON. WHEN 'S'. WRITE / icon_green_light AS ICON. WHEN OTHERS. WRITE / icon_light_out AS ICON. " ICON_ARROW_RIGHT ENDCASE.
WRITE p_msg. ENDFORM. "WriteMessage *&---------------------------------------------------------------------* *& Form add *&---------------------------------------------------------------------* * text *----------------------------------------------------------------------* FORM add . DATA _keys TYPE ygpl_tadir_search=>tt_compkeys.
TRY. _keys = ygpl_tadir_search=>get_keys_from_tadir( srcsystem = s_srcs[] type = s_type[] name = s_name[] packages = s_pack[] ext = p_ext author = s_author[] ). * No component was selected with this parameters IF _keys IS INITIAL. MESSAGE s054. EXIT. ENDIF. objlist->add_keys( _keys ).
CATCH ZCX_ZAPLINK INTO o_exception. o_exception->write( ). EXIT. ENDTRY.
* PERFORM dsp_result_display USING space objlist space.
ENDFORM. " add *&---------------------------------------------------------------------* *& Form add_tr *&---------------------------------------------------------------------* FORM add_tr USING r_tr TYPE zaplink_gui=>tr_tr. DATA _keys TYPE zaplink_gui=>tt_compkeys.
IF r_tr[] IS INITIAL. MESSAGE i000(0k) WITH 'Transport Request required'(003). EXIT. ENDIF.
TRY. _keys = zaplink_gui=>get_keys_from_tr( r_tr ). * No component was selected with this parameters IF _keys IS INITIAL. MESSAGE s054. EXIT. ENDIF. objlist->add_keys( _keys ).
CATCH ZCX_ZAPLINK INTO o_exception. o_exception->write( ). EXIT. ENDTRY.
ENDFORM. " add_tr *&---------------------------------------------------------------------* *& Form CREATE_OBJECT_LIST *&---------------------------------------------------------------------* FORM create_object_list . CREATE OBJECT objlist. CASE abap_true. WHEN a_add. PERFORM add. " add objects WHEN a_add_tr. PERFORM add_tr USING s_tr[]. " add transport requests ENDCASE.
objlist->select_default( zaplink_list=>sel_actions-export ). objlist->change_selection( ). ENDFORM. " CREATE_OBJECT_LIST *&---------------------------------------------------------------------* *& Form GET_COMPONENTS *&---------------------------------------------------------------------* FORM get_components . DATA o_list TYPE to_objlist.
o_list = objlist->selection_as_list( ). keys = o_list->get_keys( ). ENDFORM. " GET_COMPONENTS
